content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Greetings Max Müller. While discussing the rental price of my Duisburg apartment, let me begin with a higher figure than what you might expect - 1250 Euros per month. However, I am open to negotiations with the goal of reaching an agreement mutually beneficial for both parties. If you find this opening price unreasonable, do express your concerns and we can work towards a compromise.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's a bit too high for me. I was hoping for something around 750 euros per month. But since you mentioned that the apartment is in the city center and has easy access to important facilities, I understand why the price is higher. Can you meet me somewhere in the middle, let's say 900 euros?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I appreciate your interest in my apartment despite its initial high asking price, Max Müller. While 900 Euros per month is somewhat lower than my opening bid, it still falls short of the advantage I seek when renting out this prime location property. However, I am willing to make a slight concession to accommodate your budget and secure this tenant-landlord relationship. Let me agree to the price of 950 Euros per month. Now, if there are no further alterations required from your end, we can consider this negotiation concluded. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
